title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 89.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 89.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

The provisions of this Part shall apply only to officers and
employees in the Executive Branch who have been designated managerial or
confidential pursuant to article 14 of the Civil Service Law, (hereinafter
referred to as employee), and who are subject to: (a) the attendance rules for employees in New

York State departments and institutions; (b) the attendance rules for institution
teachers of the Department of Correctional Services; (c) the attendance rules for institution
teachers of the Office of Mental Health; (d) the attendance rules of the Division of

Military and Naval Affairs; or
(e) the attendance rules of the Division of State Police. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
89.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
